entry.title: Why Book Review?
entry.summary:
Passion

To keep on working on any personal project you need motivation, that's a given. Without any constraints or external pressure to work on something, what else can help you maintain motivation? Are factors like potential gain, popularity or recognition enough? Answer from personal experience: no.. these probably help at the beginning, but on the long run they'll leave you unfulfilled.

entry.title: How to do data integration, BRD example
entry.summary:
Data Integration: one of the main BI functions

Designing proper and cohesive architecture is key to BI project success. Unfortunately, business is pressuring technical teams for quick delivery, and IT jumps straight to designing star schema or dimensional models (the presentation layer), and neglect the integration layer. End result: no separation of concerns will exist between the integration AND presentation aspects.
